Neither more futile, nor more stupid than her younger sister, she cannot understand that she is merely an object of desire. And, as such, she can only be taken. Or had. Indeed, this is the subject: a girl's loss of virginity. Miraculously, he gets his wish. This new arrival helps him rehearse for a talent show and leads both boys to learn from each other and grow closer.","popularity":12.261,"poster_path":"/7ae4SOYdZo1aXsfUwwhho1bSRE9.jpg","release_date":"2023-10-05","title":"Bonus Track","video":false,"vote_average":5.8,"vote_count":5},{"adult":false,"backdrop_path":null,"genre_ids":[18],"id":226003,"original_language":"en","original_title":"Random","overview":"Interspersed with a commentary by a female narrator,who at times assumes their roles,the father,mother and daughter and son of a black,South London family commence their day and we follow them through it in all its mundanity until it climaxes in a random act of violence,killing one of the family and taking up the after-math.","popularity":4.25,"poster_path":null,"release_date":"2011-08-23","title":"Random","video":false,"vote_average":3.5,"vote_count":2},{"adult":false,"backdrop_path":null,"genre_ids":[18],"id":388583,"original_language":"fi","original_title":"Da Capo","overview":"Interwoven with scenes that are meant to grab attention by their stunning composition, this biographical look at Finland's violinist Arto Arsi is not so much a narration of his childhood and early years, as an attempt to artistically show what was happening inside his psyche during that time. Literally sold to a master teacher, Sergei Rippas (Tarmo Manni) by his mother when he was still a child, the violin prodigy was forcefully and strictly raised to practice, practice, and perfect his technique. Once an adult, Arsi finds a way to escape the rigors of a U.S. tour and drowns his overworked self in drink, or seeks out one-night stands, or otherwise lets off steam. The tightly-wound spring that has been coiled since he was forced into his grueling training and work sessions -- shown through symbolic images -- eventually snaps in a healthy way, freeing Arsi at last to continue on, simply for the love of music.","popularity":2.47,"poster_path":"/qOpmTjHV74StdTmtybSzfobeL6w.jpg","release_date":"1985-08-16","title":"Da Capo","video":false,"vote_average":2.0,"vote_count":1},{"adult":false,"backdrop_path":null,"genre_ids":[18,27],"id":388593,"original_language":"es","original_title":"Olalla","overview":"Based in the story by Robert Louis Stevenson, \"Olalla\" tells the story of a gothic and decadent family of genetic vampires who need human blood to survive, and where incest is the only way to maintain the family line.","popularity":2.988,"poster_path":"/4oRmV79cTHFYJPLyAkQE287i4iK.jpg","release_date":"2015-01-29","title":"Olalla","video":false,"vote_average":5.9,"vote_count":8},{"adult":false,"backdrop_path":null,"genre_ids":[18],"id":226058,"original_language":"en","original_title":"Motherland","overview":"After a long absence abroad, young Asian American woman Raffi Tang is called home when her estranged mother is murdered.
